title: Provide a way to generate multi-module application

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Description

Currently the Quarkus dev tool-chain generates simple maven project. Multi-module application topics are covered in some Quarkus guides, continuous testing supports multi-module projects, Quarkus CLI can operate on top of multi-module projects.

Thus there should be a way to generate multi-module end user application. The number of modules should be configurable with the default set to 3.

Note: There is `create-extension` goal which generates multi-module project, but that is not end user application.

There are several areas that this enhancement touches:
 - Quarkus maven plugin
 - Quarkus CLI
 - code.quarkus
 - codestarts (imho not designed for multi-module project atm)

Codestart and code.quarkus implications can be quite challenging for implementation, so maybe simple "create-multi-module" maven goal / CLI command would be a good start.

I would really appreciate quick multi module app bootstrap when experimenting with Quarkus.
